value.halfverse:
I have said to the LORD, “You are my Lord,
 my good above all other.”
value.verse: Protect me, O God, for I take refuge in you; *

value.halfverse: upon those who are noble among the people.
value.verse: All my delight is upon the godly that are in the land, *
But those who run after other gods *
Their libations of blood I will not offer, *
value.halfverse: nor take the names of their gods upon my lips.
it is you who uphold my lot.
value.verse: O LORD, you are my portion and my cup; *

value.halfverse: indeed, I have a goodly heritage.
value.verse: My boundaries enclose a pleasant land; *

value.halfverse: my heart teaches me, night after night.
value.verse: I will bless the LORD who gives me counsel; *

value.halfverse: because he is at my right hand I shall not fall.
value.verse: I have set the LORD always before me; *
My heart, therefore, is glad, and my spirit rejoices; *
value.halfverse: my body also shall rest in hope.
nor let your holy one see the Pit.
value.verse: For you will not abandon me to the grave, *
You will show me the path of life; *
value.halfverse:
in your presence there is fullness of joy,
 and in your right hand are pleasures for evermore.
